name: Boaty Go Fasty Fasty Against Icebergy
name_original: Boaty Go Fasty Fasty Against Icebergy
description:
Poseidon, god of the seas, has shown his wrath by breaking down the Ark that Noah has built to save all earthly species.
Your goal is to be the quickest possible and take all animals to the escape boats. But be careful!
Organizing all animals, big and small, in such a confined escape boat requires some expertise.
